Html:
Hi

We are 7 months after the last release - will be another one?

 

Thanks

Yup, there will be another!  :)  This is still (for the most post) a spare time project so we can't devote a ton of time to it (just some evenings).  We're starting to get some outside contributions, but we have a lot to do.  We took a step back after that last release to figure out what would take Oxite to the next level and decided it would be worth the way to build out a great platform so that's what we're doing.  Lame answer, but the wait will be worth it.  Promise.  :)

You should definitely take a look at our latest checkins to see where we're going for the next release.
